step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
Nicely done raising your hands towards your forehead. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together.
Great job sliding hands behind your head and spreading elbows. Focus on keeping your head upright.
Holding steady! Remember to maintain an upright head position throughout the hold.
Good return to the starting position. Watch that you don't pull your hands forward.
Second rep, starting strong with hands clasped in your lap.
Good movement towards the forehead. Aim to keep those elbows a little closer.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Keep your head facing forward.
Holding the position well. Remember the tip to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Well done returning to the start. You're doing great with this exercise!

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close when raising your hands and spreading them wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward to maximize the stretch.
